attributes.action: Honour UK  War Zone Media Teams
attributes.background: Honour all UK  members of Media Teams reporting from war zones, especially in Ukraine they are risking their life on an hourly basis to tell the world the truth.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
